uuid.description: A universally unique identifier for the entity.

shortname.description: A short name or abbreviation for the entity.

slug.description: A URL-friendly version of the short name.

created_at.description: The date and time that the entity was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time that the entity was last updated.

is_active.description: Whether the entity is currently active or not.

tags.description: A list of tags or keywords associated with the entity.

owner_shortname.description: The short name of the owner of the entity.

locator.description: Information about where the entity can be located.

uuid.description: A universally unique identifier for the location.

shortname.description: A short name or abbreviation for the location.

displayname.description: The name of the location that should be displayed to users.

space_name.description: The name of the space where the entity can be found.

tags.description: A list of tags or keywords associated with the location.

translation.description: Information about the entity's translations in different languages.

en.description: The English translation of the entity.

ar.description: The Arabic translation of the entity.

kd.description: The Kurdish translation of the entity.
